name: JBox Web :: Free Projects
tagline: A french Web Agency, based in Marseille www.jbox-web.com.
body:
Why this page?
==============

Because at JBox Web we do love Free (Open Source) projects, we try to contribute here, by publishing the source code of the tools we develop or improve for our use.

## Applications

* [Deploy'It](http://jbox-web.github.io/deploy-it/)
* [Docker Registry Browser](http://jbox-web.github.io/docker-registry-browser/)
* [Jyraphe](http://jbox-web.github.io/jyraphe/)

## Redmine Plugins

* [Redmine Git Hosting](http://redmine-git-hosting.io/)
* [Redmine Jenkins](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_jenkins/)
* [Redmine d'Anth√®s](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_danthes/)
* [Redmine Bootstrap Kit](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_bootstrap_kit/)
* [Redmine Default Members](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_default_members/)
* [Redmine Mail Checker](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_mail_checker/)
* [Redmine Pusher Notifications](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_pusher_notifications/)

## Jenkins Plugins

* [Jenkins Job Database Manager Plugin for MySQL](http://jbox-web.github.io/job-database-manager-mysql/)
* [Jenkins Job Database Manager Plugin for PostgreSQL](http://jbox-web.github.io/job-database-manager-postgresql/)

## Shinken Plugins

* [Check Nginx Upstreams](http://jbox-web.github.io/check_nginx_upstreams/)

## Joomla Plugins

* [JBox AddThis SmartLayer module for Joomla](http://jbox-web.github.io/mod_jbox_addthis/)

## Ruby librairies

* [jbox-gitolite (Grit version)](http://jbox-web.github.io/gitolite/)
* [gitolite-rugged (Rugged version)](http://jbox-web.github.io/gitolite-rugged/)
* [acts_as_notifiable_redmine](http://jbox-web.github.io/acts_as_notifiable_redmine/)
* [async_notifications](http://jbox-web.github.io/async_notifications/)
* [active_use_case](http://jbox-web.github.io/active_use_case/)
* [acts_as_auditable](http://jbox-web.github.io/acts_as_auditable/)
* [jenkins-plugin-base](http://jbox-web.github.io/jenkins-plugin-base/)
* [job-database-manager](http://jbox-web.github.io/job-database-manager/)
* [gh-preview](http://jbox-web.github.io/gh-preview/)

## Python librairies

* [Django Gearman JBox](http://jbox-web.github.io/django-gearman-jbox/)

and more to come...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
